name: Sadikul Saber
title: AI Consultant
headline: Helping organizations harness the power of artificial intelligence
bio: I'm an AI consultant specializing in helping businesses implement machine learning solutions, optimize their AI strategies, and build AI-native applications. With expertise in LLMs, computer vision, and data engineering, I partner with teams to turn AI concepts into production systems.

services.title: AI Strategy Consulting
services.description: Assess your AI readiness, identify high-impact opportunities, and develop a roadmap for implementation.

services.title: LLM Integration
services.description: Integrate large language models into your workflows, from chatbots to content generation and code assistance.

services.title: ML Model Development
services.description: Build and deploy custom machine learning models for classification, prediction, and optimization tasks.

projects.title: Customer Support Chatbot
projects.description: Built a context-aware chatbot using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and LLMs that reduced support ticket volume by 40%. Integrated with existing knowledge bases and Slack workflows.

projects.title: Predictive Analytics Pipeline
projects.description: Developed an end-to-end ML pipeline for forecasting customer churn. Used feature engineering, XGBoost models, and automated retraining. Resulted in 25% reduction in churn rate.

projects.title: Document Intelligence System
projects.description: Created a document processing system using computer vision and OCR to automate data extraction. Processed 10,000+ documents monthly with 95% accuracy, saving 200+ hours of manual work.

contact.callToAction: Let's build something amazing together. Get in touch!
